org.minijson

Interface JsonSerializable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FastJsonSerializable, IndentedJsonSerializable, JsonAny, JsonArray, JsonArrayNode, JsonBooleanNode, JsonBuildable, JsonLeafNode, JsonNode, JsonNullNode, JsonNumberNode, JsonObject, JsonObjectNode, JsonStringNode, JsonStructNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJsonArrayNode, AbstractJsonBooleanNode, AbstractJsonLeafNode, AbstractJsonNode, AbstractJsonNullNode, AbstractJsonNumberNode, AbstractJsonObjectNode, AbstractJsonStringNode, AbstractJsonStructNode, MiniJsonArray, MiniJsonBase, MiniJsonBuildable, MiniJsonObject, MiniJsonSerializable, MiniJsonWrapper

    public interface JsonSerializable
    JsonSerializable represents the "opposite" of JsonParseable.

    • Method Summary

      Creates a JSON string from this object.

      Writes a JSON string representation of this object to the writer.
